Electoral Roll: Electoral Roll of 1974/75 certified on 31st May 1975
Electoral Roll of 1980 certified on 22nd May 1980
Electoral Roll of 1992 certified on 27th May 1993
Electoral Roll of 1998 certified on 7th January 1999
Principal Electoral Roll of 2003 that was certified on 2nd March 2004 and gazetted on 4th March 2004
Notes: First time synced with General Election cycle dates

Electoral Roll: Principal Electoral Roll of 2007 that was gazetted on 5th February 2008
Principal Electoral of 2011 merged with four Supplementary Rolls of 2012 which was gazetted on 11th April 2013
Electoral Roll up to 4th Quarter of 2017 gazetted on 14th April 2018
Principal Electoral Roll of 2019 which was combined with 1st Quarter of 2020 electoral roll which was certified on 12th August 2020
Notes: Sabah state elections no longer synced with General Election cycle dates

Electoral Roll: Electoral Roll up to August 2025 Supplementary electoral roll which was updated up to 5th October 2025
